skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 4 times. Has a 20% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Marked for Destruction
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit has a 35% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Biodisruptor
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies, decreases their Turn Meters by 15%, then attacks the targeted enemy. Enemies killed by this Skill cannot be revived.
skills.name: Sealed Fate
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Whenever an enemy places a [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], or [Provoke] debuff on this Champion, instantly removes the debuff, then heals this Champion by 20% of their MAX HP and boosts their Turn Meter by 50%.
skills.name: Living Armor [P]
